{/* @sniptest testers/browser-controls/sms_read.py */}

```python sms_read.py
from notte_sdk import NotteClient

client = NotteClient()


def extract_code(messages):
    # Extract verification code from messages
    return "123456"


# Create persona with phone number
persona = client.Persona()
number = persona.create_number(country="US")

# Use in session
with client.Session() as session:
    # Trigger SMS (e.g., 2FA code)
    session.execute(type="fill", selector="input[name='phone']", value=number.phone_number)
    session.execute(type="click", selector="button.send-code")

    # Read SMS
    messages = session.execute(type="sms_read", persona_id=persona.persona_id)

    # Extract verification code
    code = extract_code(messages)
```
